purpose: The email announces two postdoc positions available at King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals (KFUPM) in Saudi Arabia, focusing on Secure Software Development/Software Security and Artificial Intelligence in Software Engineering. It invites qualified candidates with a Ph.D. in relevant fields to apply and provides contact information for inquiries.
evidence_sentences: We are seeking applications for two postdoc positions in the areas of Secure Software Development/Software Security and Artificial Intelligence in Software Engineering.
The positions are for two years, with the possibility of extension for an additional two years based on performance and mutual agreement.
Applicants must have, or be near the completion of, a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a closely related field.
Interested candidates are invited to send their CV or direct any inquiries to: Prof. Mohammad Alshayeb: [log in to unmask]
We look forward to hearing from qualified candidates who are enthusiastic about contributing to impactful research at KFUPM.
